properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the load panel is enabled.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Specifies the height of the load panel in pixels.

properties.name: indicatorSrc
properties.description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

properties.name: shading
properties.description: Specifies whether to shade the UI component when the load panel is shown.

properties.name: shadingColor
properties.description: Specifies the shading color. Applies only if [shading] is **true**.

properties.name: showIndicator
properties.description: Specifies whether to show the loading indicator.

properties.name: showPane
properties.description: Specifies whether to show the pane of the load panel.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Specifies text displayed on the load panel.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.
